name: Trains of the Orient
description: Start with steam locomotives, end with high-speed trains! Become the first Minister of Railways of China in mid-1950s and connect entire East Asia with a network of reliable and high-tech railways.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
